All subject receive multiple dose three day YHD1119 Pregabalin IR remain clinic completion assessment Day 19 include collection PK sample . DOC.criteria: Healthy male body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 28 kg/m2 Who suffer clinically significant disease Provision sign write informed consent History clinically significant disease A history drug abuse presence positive reaction drug abuse potential urine screening drug Administration investigational product within 3 month prior first dose
